planningNote: Rough timeline - feel free to adjust! No one's watching the clock. â˜•

timeline.title: Everyone Arrives
timeline.description: Hand out mystery packets, open Envelope 1, grab snacks.

timeline.title: Mingle & Investigate
timeline.description: Chat, trade clues, snack. Open Envelope 2 when ready.

timeline.title: Things Get Interesting
timeline.description: Open Envelope 3, let the drama unfold.

timeline.title: The Big Reveal
timeline.description: Open Envelope 4, then bring out the cupcakes with messages!

timeline.title: Wrap Up
timeline.description: Toast to Marlena, group photo, celebrate!

quickTips: Timing is flexible - go with the vibe
If people are having fun mingling, let it run longer
If energy drops, speed it up
You don't need to explain everything - just hand out packets and call envelope times
